result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
result.translation: Kandi muzirikane ubwo twabwiraga abamalayika tuti “Nimwubamire[1] Adamu”, nuko bose bakubama uretse Ibilisi (Shitani) wanze akishyira hejuru nuko akaba mu bahakanyi (banze kumvira Allah).
result.footnotes: [1] Ukubama kuvugwa hano ni indamutso y’icyubahiro gihebuje.
